alert.note: Alert for Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 30 at 2:33AM CST until November 30 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CST FOR CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 233 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Fruitdale, or 13 miles southwest of Chatom, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Tibbie around 250 AM CST. McIntosh around 310 AM CST. Wagarville around 315 AM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
